attributes.action: go before the Iraq war inquiry prior to the election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown should go before the Iraq inquiry before the election as Geoffrey Hoon has said that he starved the armed forces of money even though a war was likely which led to cancellation of helicoptors and other vital equipment which would now be coming into service

rejection.details:
The PM will appear before the independent Iraq inquiry when he is called to do so. 

Last week the Prime Minister said he had offered to give evidence at any time.  

He added that the inquiry had proposed a range of dates over the next two months.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
